sentences.en: Don't demean yourself by doing anything dishonourable.
sentences.cn: 不要做出任何不光彩的事情而有失自己身份.

sentences.en: He was not a dishonourable man, he was merely a professional.
sentences.cn: 他不是个不知羞耻的人，他只是个专业人士。

sentences.en: His dishonourable behaviour estranged him from his family.
sentences.cn: 他那不体面的行为使他跟全家人疏远了.

sentences.en: It would have been dishonourable of her not to keep her promise.
sentences.cn: 她要是不履行诺言就不光彩了。

sentences.en: The officer was reduced in rank for dishonourable action.
sentences.cn: 那个军官由于不光彩的行径而被降职.

sentences.en: You can't deny that Tom has been an ilde, worthless, dissolute and dishonourable rogue.
sentences.cn: 你也不能否认汤姆是个游手好闲 、 一钱不值 、 放荡无耻的坏蛋吧.

words.tran_cn: 拒付；使丢脸；拒绝承兑；不履行（诺言等）
不名誉的；无耻的；不受尊重的（等于dishonorable）

trans.tran_cn: <英>不名誉的，不端，不光采，鬼祟
